sentences.cn: [ m ] 和 [ n ] 是鼻音字母.

sentences.en: A nasal spray or drops would ease your symptoms, but don't overuse them or further congestion could result.
sentences.cn: 鼻腔喷剂或滴剂能减轻症状，但请勿使用过频，否则鼻塞可能会加重。

sentences.en: He recognized the flat nasal voice of Herbie Chandler.
sentences.cn: 他听出是赫比·钱德勒的低沉而带有鼻音的声调.

sentences.en: He spoke with a nasal twang.
He started to speak in a nasal sing-song voice.
sentences.cn: 他开始用一种带有鼻音的、抑扬顿挫的声调说话。

sentences.en: He was suffering from nasal catarrh.
Her voice was nasal and penetrating.
sentences.cn: 她说话带有鼻音，很刺耳。

sentences.en: His speech became increasingly thick and nasal.
sentences.cn: 他说话的声音变得越来越粗，鼻音越来越重。

sentences.en: Nose drops often relieve nasal congestion.
sentences.cn: 滴鼻剂常可缓解鼻腔充血.

sentences.en: Peppermint leaves are believed to relieve tiredness and nasal stuffiness.
sentences.cn: 据信薄荷叶可以减轻疲劳和鼻塞。

sentences.en: She talked in a deep nasal monotone.
sentences.cn: 她说话鼻音很重，语调单一。

sentences.en: The method of measurement is the same for oral or nasal insertion.
sentences.cn: 经口和经鼻这两种途径插管所测量的方法相同.

sentences.en: The nasal spray was new on the market and highly efficacious.
sentences.cn: 这种鼻腔喷雾剂是新上市的，非常有效。

sentences.en: We breathe through the nasal passage.

phrases.tran_cn: 鼻用喷雾，鼻喷入法；喷鼻剂

trans.tran_en: a particular speech sound such as /m/, /n/, or /N/ that is made through your nose
